scripts.build: next build && next export -o out/ && touch ./out/.nojekyll &&  cd out/ && git init && git add ./ && git commit -m 'Deploy Next.js to gh-pages' && git remote add origin git@github.com:rohitmusti/rohitmusti.github.io.git && git push origin HEAD:gh-pages --force && cd ../ && rm -rf out/
